<title level="1" right="Trait">[Tethered](/Traits.aspx?ID=804)</title>

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 274 <sup>1.1</sup>

This weapon is attached to a length of rope or chain that allows you to retrieve it after it has left your hand. If you have a free hand (including if you've just thrown a two-handed tethered weapon and have a hand holding nothing but the weapon's tether), you can use an [Interact](/Actions.aspx?ID=2297) action to pull the weapon back into your grasp after you have thrown it as a ranged attack or after it has been [disarmed](/Actions.aspx?ID=2383) (unless it's being held by another creature).
name: Tethered
